label: logicA:manufacturing_en
steps: [1] If the design release is approved, then the CNC machining program is generated.
[2] If the CNC machining program is generated, then the CNC machines are set up for production.
[3] For every component x, if x is heat-treated, then x meets the hardness specification.
[6] The CNC machining program is generated (from [1] and [5]).
[7] The CNC machines are set up for production (from [2] and [6]).
[8] The gear shaft meets the hardness specification (from [3] and [4]).
[9] The CNC machines are set up for production and the gear shaft meets the hardness specification (from [7] and [8]).
